name: Kempinski Hotel Dalian

reviews.text: The Kempinski is one of Dalian's newer hotels, located directly across from Labor Park and adjacent to some of Dalian's most flashy shopping destinations.
reviews.title: Convenient and Great Value in Dalian

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I selected the Kempinski due to its location slightly outside the downtown area, so that the amount of time transiting to the software park on the other end of the city would be reduced by a few minutes. I also wanted a place to go running in the morning, and was hopeful that Labor Park would be suitable.
reviews.title: Nice hotel - convenient location

reviews.text: The location did save some time versus either the Intercontinental or Shangri-La. Not battling Dalian's congested traffic around Zhongsan Square saved about 10-15 min time savings for the trip to and from the software park.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Good people, Good Paulaner Beer

reviews.text: This is an excellent hotel in Dalian. It is well located across from one of the many parks in the city. The rooms were wonderful especially those on a high floor. Very clean and well maintained. One problem is that the walls are thin so you can hear noise from the rooms next door but this is endemic to Chinese hotels and other buildings. The buffet which is included in the price was excellent with a wide variety of Western and non-Western dishes. the highlight of the hotel was the spectacular swimming pool and health spa - spotlessly clean with outstanding atmosphere. Bar on top floor has great view but drinks were just okay.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: This hotel is situated near lovely shopping centres and overlooks a beautiful park - The service provided by the staff is second to none... pay the extra and stay in an executive room these are large roomy and have large bathrooms - you also get the use of a private lounge.
reviews.title: Great Hotel Great Location

reviews.text: I would reccommend this room for independant travellers and couples.. the spa and pool is kept beautifully clean and the staff welcoming - the gym small but well managed.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in Dalian

description: Hotel is located in the heart of the commercial and business district, opposite the Labour Park and only few steps away from the shopping center. Friendly service and unique Kempinski hospitality will be your best choice for both leisure and business. We offer 400 well appointed guest rooms and suites, meeting and Banquet facilities for up to 500 guests, Cafe Berlin Restaurant offering a splendid selection of international cuisines and Kempi Deli with a large selection of Valrhona in both traditional and exotic flavors, breads, cookies, ice cream, cakes, etc.
